formattedAddress: 200 Central Park S #209, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 200 Central Park S #209, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
I feel very fortunate to have found Dr.Geller! I have received exceptional service from him and his assistant Monika over the years.

Whether it's a root canal, crown, bridge or implant - Dr.Geller and his assistant worked meticulously and tirelessly round the clock to provide the best quality care that always exceeded my functional and cosmetic needs - very durable and nothing short of perfection!

Great attention to detail and commitment to excellence at every step of the treatment. Dr.Geller is genuinely compassionate and accommodating with my schedule and always makes the experience comfortable, reassuring, very respectful and painless. His professionalism and kindness create a warm atmosphere that is very reassuring. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr.Geller to anyone seeking dental care - one of the best in the area!

originalText.text: An excellent dentist. Didn’t let me leave until we made a plan for my care - a really hardworking doctor. He and his wife are beyond caring. She put her hand on my shoulder at any sign of discomfort. They make an excellent team and work super seamlessly together. Really, really nice people. Will be seeing Dr. Geller from now on!

text.text: An excellent dentist. Didn’t let me leave until we made a plan for my care - a really hardworking doctor. He and his wife are beyond caring. She put her hand on my shoulder at any sign of discomfort. They make an excellent team and work super seamlessly together. Really, really nice people. Will be seeing Dr. Geller from now on!

originalText.text: Dr. Geller is the best dentist I could have hoped to find in NYC. I’ve had a lot of dental trouble this year and I really lucked out when I found his office. He’s repaired the work done by sloppy dentists I saw in the past, and he always takes the time to make sure I receive the care that I need. While dental work, by nature, can be unpleasant, when I’m under Dr. Geller and his assistant/Wife Monika’s care, I can rest easy. I couldn’t recommend Dr. Geller enough. Whether you’re suffering from tooth pain, a more severe issue or just looking to keep your teeth healthy over the years, Dr. Geller is your guy.

originalText.text:
One of a kind!

Dr. Geller saved and rebuilt the tooth my prior dentist wanted to extract!

Dr. Geller is kind, passionate, and confident ( not pompous ) about dentistry. Because of his confidence and precision, I only trust him to do all my dental work, including the implant for my lower front tooth and my stunning veneers!

Dr. Geller and Monika are the best of the best!

Please don't ever retire! Thank you again and again!

originalText.text: Dr. Barnett Geller is the best dentist I have ever been to. He is dedicated to his craft an deeply about each patient. He is the best in the business and always delivers the most amazing results. He is worth every penny and I would highly recommend him to everyone because they will have the most clean teeth and best experience ever.
